00018 template <
00019   class CHAR_TYPE = char,
00020   int COPY_ON_WRITE = 1,
00021   uint32_t BUCKET_BYTES = 64 //BYTES
00022   >
00023 class deque_string
00024 {
00025 public:
00026   typedef CHAR_TYPE value_type;
00027   typedef CHAR_TYPE CharT;
00028   typedef uint8_t  ReferT;
00029   typedef deque_string<CHAR_TYPE, COPY_ON_WRITE, BUCKET_BYTES> SelfT;
00030   typedef std::size_t size_t;
00031   enum 
00032     {
00033       BUCKET_LENGTH = BUCKET_BYTES/sizeof(CharT)
00034     };
00035     
00036   
00037   static const size_t npos;

00039   class const_iterator;
00040   
00041   class iterator :
00042     public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, CharT>
00043   {
00044 
00045   friend class const_iterator;
00046   public:
00047     iterator(SelfT* obj=NULL, const uint64_t* entry_array=NULL, size_t entry_i=-1, const size_t ii=0)
00048       : entry_array_(entry_array), entry_i_(entry_i), ii_(ii), obj_(obj)
00049     {
00050     }
00051     
00052     ~iterator() {}
00053 
00054     // The assignment and relational operators are straightforward
00055     iterator& operator = (const iterator& other)
00056     {
00057       entry_array_ = other.entry_array_;
00058       entry_i_ = other.entry_i_;
00059       ii_ = other.ii_;
00060       obj_ = other.obj_;
00061       
00062       return(*this);
00063     }
00064 
00065     bool operator==(const iterator& other)const
00066     {
00067       return(ii_ == other.ii_ && entry_i_ == other.entry_i_ && entry_array_==other.entry_array_);
00068     }
00069 
00070     bool operator != (const iterator& other)const
00071     {
00072       return(ii_ != other.ii_ || entry_i_ != other.entry_i_ || entry_array_!=other.entry_array_);
00073     }
00074 
00075     bool operator < (const iterator& other)const
00076     {
00077       return entry_i_ < other.entry_i_ ||
00078         entry_i_ == other.entry_i_ && ii_ < other.ii_;
00079     }
00080     
00081     bool operator > (const iterator& other)const
00082     {
00083       return entry_i_ > other.entry_i_ ||
00084         entry_i_ == other.entry_i_ && ii_ > other.ii_;
00085     }
00086 
00087     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00088     // SQueue.
00089     iterator& operator++()
00090     {
00091       if (ii_== BUCKET_LENGTH-1)
00092       {
00093         ii_ = 0;
00094         entry_i_++;
00095         return *this;
00096       }
00097 
00098       ii_++;
00099             
00100       return(*this);
00101     }
00102 
00103     iterator operator++(int)
00104     {
00105       iterator tmp(*this);
00106       
00107       if (ii_== BUCKET_LENGTH-1)
00108       {
00109         ii_ = 0;
00110         entry_i_++;
00111         return tmp;
00112       }
00113 
00114       ii_++;
00115 
00116       return(tmp);
00117     }
00118 
00119     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00120     // SQueue.
00121     iterator& operator--()
00122     {
00123       if (ii_ == 0)
00124       {
00125         entry_i_--;
00126         ii_= BUCKET_LENGTH -1;
00127         return *this;
00128       }
00129 
00130       ii_--;
00131 
00132       return(*this);
00133     }
00134 
00135     iterator operator--(int)
00136     {
00137       iterator tmp(*this);
00138       if (ii_ == 0)
00139       {
00140         entry_i_--;
00141         ii_= BUCKET_LENGTH -1;
00142         return tmp;
00143       }
00144 
00145       ii_--;
00146 
00147       return(tmp);
00148     }
00149 
00150     // Return a reference to the value in the node.  I do this instead
00151     // of returning by value so a caller can update the value in the
00152     // node directly.
00153     CharT& operator*()
00154     {
00155       if (obj_->is_refered())
00156       {
00157         (*obj_).assign_self();
00158         entry_array_ = obj_->get_entry_array();
00159       }
00160       
00161       return ((CharT*)(entry_array_[entry_i_]))[ii_];
00162     }
00163 
00164     uint64_t operator - (const iterator& other) const
00165     {
00166       if (entry_array_ != other.entry_array_)
00167         return -1;
00168 
00169       return entry_i_*BUCKET_LENGTH+ii_ - other.entry_i_*BUCKET_LENGTH+other.ii_;
00170     }
00171 
00172     iterator operator + (const int& gap) 
00173     {
00174       iterator tmp(*this);
00175       size_t t = entry_i_*BUCKET_LENGTH+ii_;
00176       t += gap;
00177       tmp.entry_i_ = t/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00178       tmp.ii_ = t%BUCKET_LENGTH;
00179       return tmp;
00180     }
00181 
00182     iterator operator - (const int& gap) 
00183     {
00184       iterator tmp(*this);
00185       size_t t = entry_i_*BUCKET_LENGTH+ii_;
00186       t -= gap;
00187       tmp.entry_i_ = t/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00188       tmp.ii_ = t%BUCKET_LENGTH;
00189       return tmp;
00190     }
00191     
00192   protected:
00193     const uint64_t* entry_array_;
00194     size_t entry_i_;
00195     size_t ii_;
00196     SelfT* obj_;
00197   };

00683 
00684   
00685 protected:
00686   char* p_;
00687   size_t start_i_;//globle start position in deque.
00688   size_t length_;
00689   size_t max_size_;
00690   size_t entry_size_;
00691   CharT** en_array_;
00692 
00693   bool refer()
00694   {
00695     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00696       return false;
00697     
00698     //lock    
00699     if (p_!=NULL)
00700       (*(ReferT*)p_)++;
00701 
00702     return true;
00703   }
00704   
00705   void derefer()
00706   { 
00707     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00708     {
00709       if (p_!=NULL)
00710       {
00711         hlfree(p_);
00712         p_ = NULL;
00713       }
00714       
00715       return ;
00716     }
00717 
00718     //lock
00719     if (p_!=NULL)
00720       if (*(ReferT*)p_ > 0)
00721       (*(ReferT*)p_)--;
00722 
00723     if (p_!=NULL)
00724       if (*(ReferT*)p_== 0)
00725       {
00726         for (size_t i=0; i<entry_size_; i++)
00727           if (get_entry(i)!=NULL)
00728           {
00729             hlfree(get_entry(i));
00730             set_entry(i, NULL);
00731           }
00732         
00733         hlfree(p_);
00734         p_ = NULL;
00735       }
00736     
00737   }
00738 
00739   inline void clear_reference()
00740   {     
00741     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00742       return ;
00743 
00744     //lock
00745     if (p_!=NULL)
00746       (*(ReferT*)p_) = 1;
00747   }
00748 
00749   bool is_refered() const
00750   {
00751     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00752       return false;
00753     
00754     //lock
00755     if (p_ == NULL)
00756       return false;
00757     
00758     if (*(ReferT*)p_ > 1)
00759       return true;
00760 
00761     return false;
00762   }
00763    
00764   void assign_self()
00765   {
00766     if (!is_refered())
00767       return;
00768 
00769     char* p;
00770     size_t es = init_entry(length_, &p);
00771     size_t st = BUCKET_LENGTH;
00772     size_t ei = 0;
00773 
00774     const_iterator it = begin();
00775     for (size_t i=0; it!=end() && i<length_; i++, it++)
00776     {
00777       if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
00778         ei++;
00779       
00780       ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
00781         = *it;
00782       
00783     }
00784         
00785     derefer();
00786     p_ = p;
00787     start_i_ = st;
00788     entry_size_ = es;
00789     max_size_ = init_max_size();
00790     
00791     clear_reference(); 
00792   }
00793 
00794   inline size_t getLen(const CharT* s) const
00795   {
00796     CharT e = '\0';
00797     size_t i = 0;
00798     
00799     while (s[i]!=e)
00800     {
00801       i++;
00802     }
00803 
00804     return i;
00805   }
00806 
00807   inline size_t start_entry_index()const
00808   {
00809     return (start_i_)/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00810   }
00811 
00812   inline size_t end_entry_index() const
00813   {
00814     return (start_i_ + length_ - (length_==0? 0 : 1))/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00815   }
00816 
00817   inline size_t char_index_in_bucket(size_t i)const
00818   {
00819     if (i==(size_t)-1)
00820       return 0;
00821     
00822     return (start_i_ + i)%BUCKET_LENGTH;
00823   }
00824   
00825   inline size_t get_entry_index(size_t char_index)const
00826   {
00827     return (start_i_+char_index)/BUCKET_LENGTH;
00828   }
00829   
00830   inline void set_char(size_t index, CharT c)
00831   {
00832     size_t i = index + start_i_;
00833     (get_entry(i/BUCKET_LENGTH))[i%BUCKET_LENGTH] = c;
00834   }
00835 
00836   inline CharT& get_char(size_t index)
00837   {
00838     size_t i = index + start_i_;
00839     return ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i/BUCKET_LENGTH*sizeof(CharT*))))[i%BUCKET_LENGTH];
00840     //return ((get_entry(i/BUCKET_LENGTH))[i%BUCKET_LENGTH]);
00841   }
00842 
00843   inline const CharT& get_const_char(size_t index)const
00844   {
00845     size_t i = index + start_i_;
00846     return ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i/BUCKET_LENGTH*sizeof(CharT*))))[i%BUCKET_LENGTH];
00847     //return (get_const_entry(i/BUCKET_LENGTH)[i%BUCKET_LENGTH]);
00848   }
00849 
00850   inline CharT* get_entry(size_t i)
00851   {
00852     return (CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i*sizeof(CharT*)));
00853   }
00854 
00855   inline const CharT* get_const_entry(size_t i) const
00856   {
00857     return (CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i*sizeof(CharT*)));
00858   }
00859 
00860   inline uint64_t* get_entry_array()
00861   {
00862     return (uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT));
00863   }
00864 
00865   inline const uint64_t* get_const_entry_array() const
00866   {
00867     return (uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT));
00868   }
00869 
00870   inline size_t need_bucket_num(size_t k) const
00871   {
00872     return k/BUCKET_LENGTH + (k%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
00873   }
00874   
00875   inline size_t need_entry_bytes(size_t size)const
00876   {
00877     return sizeof(ReferT) + size*sizeof(CharT*);
00878   }
00879 
00880   inline size_t need_entry_size(size_t length)const
00881   {
00882     size_t es = (length + start_i_);
00883     return need_bucket_num(es);
00884   }
00885 
00886   inline void set_entry(size_t i, CharT* p)
00887   {
00888     *(uint64_t*)(p_ + sizeof(ReferT) + i*sizeof(CharT*)) = (uint64_t)p;
00889   }
00890 
00891   inline char* malloc_char(uint64_t bytes)
00892   {
00893     return (char*)hlmalloc(bytes); 
00894   }
00895 
00896   inline CharT* malloc_CharT(uint64_t bytes = BUCKET_BYTES)
00897   {
00898     return (CharT*)hlmalloc(bytes); 
00899   }
00900 
00901   size_t init_entry(size_t length, char** pp)
00902   {
00903     if (length==0 || length==(size_t)-1)
00904       length = 1;
00905     
00906     size_t es = need_bucket_num(length)+2;
00907     
00908     *pp = malloc_char(need_entry_bytes(es));
00909     *(uint64_t*)(*pp + sizeof(ReferT) + 0*sizeof(CharT*)) = 0;
00910     
00911     for (size_t i=1; i<es-1; i++)
00912       *(uint64_t*)(*pp + sizeof(ReferT) + i*sizeof(CharT*)) = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
00913       
00914     *(uint64_t*)(*pp + sizeof(ReferT) + (es-1)*sizeof(CharT*)) = 0;
00915 
00916     en_array_ = (CharT**)(*pp+sizeof(ReferT));
00917 
00918     return es;
00919   }
00920 
00921   size_t init_max_size() const
00922   {
00923     return (entry_size_-2)*BUCKET_LENGTH;
00924   }
00925   
00926 
00927   void extend_entry(size_t t, bool back=true)
00928   {
00929     p_ = (char*)hlrealloc(p_, need_entry_bytes(entry_size_+t));
00930     
00931     if (back)
00932     {
00933       for (size_t i=0; i<t; i++)
00934         set_entry(entry_size_+i, NULL);
00935       entry_size_ += t;
00936     }
00937     else
00938     {
00939       uint64_t* entry = get_entry_array();
00940       size_t e = end_entry_index();
00941       for (size_t i=e; i!=(size_t)-1; i--)
00942         entry[i+t] = entry[i];
00943       
00944       start_i_ += t*BUCKET_LENGTH;
00945       
00946       for (size_t i=0; i<t; i++)
00947         entry[i]= 0;
00948       entry_size_ += t;
00949     }
00950     
00951   }
00952 
00953   void add_buckets(size_t t, bool back=true)
00954   {
00955     //std::cout<<t<<std::endl;
00956     
00957     if (t ==0)
00958       return;
00959 
00960     //t = (size_t)(3*t);
00961     
00962     if (back)
00963     {
00964       if (end_entry_index()+t >= entry_size_)
00965         extend_entry(t);
00966     
00967       for (size_t i=0; i<t; i++)
00968       {  
00969         if (get_entry(end_entry_index()+i+1)==NULL)
00970         {
00971           set_entry(end_entry_index()+i+1, malloc_CharT());
00972           max_size_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
00973         }
00974       }
00975     }
00976     else
00977     {
00978       if (start_entry_index()<t)
00979         extend_entry(t-start_entry_index(),false);
00980 
00981       size_t s = start_entry_index()-1;
00982       for (size_t i=0; i<t; i++)
00983       {  
00984         if (get_entry(s-i)==NULL)
00985         {
00986           set_entry(s-i, malloc_CharT());
00987           max_size_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
00988         }
00989       }
00990     }
00991   }
00992   
00993 public:
00994   explicit deque_string()
00995   {
00996     entry_size_ = init_entry(1, &p_);
00997     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
00998     length_ = 0;
00999     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01000     clear_reference();
01001   }

01011   }

01113   //******************Iterators********************
01114 public:

01117   {
01118     return const_iterator(get_const_entry_array(), start_entry_index(),
01119                           start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH);
01120   }
01121 
01122   iterator begin()
01123   {
01124     return iterator(this, get_entry_array(), start_entry_index(),
01125                           start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH);
01126   }
01127 
01128   const_iterator end(int i=0) const
01129   {
01130     if (length_==0)
01131       return begin();
01132     
01133     return const_iterator(get_const_entry_array(), end_entry_index(),
01134                           char_index_in_bucket(length_-1))+1;
01135   }
01136   
01137   iterator end()
01138   {
01139     if (length_==0)
01140       return begin();
01141     
01142     return iterator(this, get_entry_array(), end_entry_index(),
01143                     char_index_in_bucket(length_-1))+1;
01144   }
01145 
01146   reverse_iterator rbegin()
01147   {
01148     return reverse_iterator(this, get_entry_array(), end_entry_index(),
01149                             char_index_in_bucket(length_-1));
01150   }

01155                           char_index_in_bucket(length_-1));
01156   }

01159   {
01160     if (length_==0)
01161       return rbegin();
01162     
01163     return reverse_iterator(this, get_entry_array(), start_entry_index(),
01164                           start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)+1;
01165   }

01168   {
01169     if (length_==0)
01170       return rbegin();

01173                           start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)+1;
01174   }

01176 
01177   //******************Capacity********************
01178 public:
01179 
01180   size_t size() const
01181   {
01182     return length_ * sizeof(CharT);
01183   }
01184 
01185   size_t length() const
01186   {
01187     return length_;
01188   }
01189 
01190   size_t max_size ( ) const
01191   {
01192     return (max_size_);
01193   }
01194 
01195   void resize (size_t n, CharT c)
01196   {
01197     assert (max_size_>=length_);
01198     
01199     if (n == length_ && n == max_size_)
01200       return;
01201 
01202     if (is_refered())
01203     {
01204       char* p;
01205       size_t es = init_entry(n, &p);
01206       size_t st = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01207       
01208       const_iterator it = begin();
01209       size_t i=0;
01210       size_t ei = 0;
01211       for (;it!= end() && i<n; i++, it++)
01212       {
01213         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
01214           ei++;
01215       
01216         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
01217           = *it;
01218       }
01219 
01220       for (;i<n; i++)
01221         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
01222           = c;
01223             
01224       derefer();
01225       start_i_ = st;
01226       entry_size_ = es;
01227       max_size_ = init_max_size();
01228       length_ = n;
01229       p_ = p;
01230       clear_reference();
01231       return;
01232     }
01233 
01234     if (n > max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)
01235     {
01236       size_t t = n - max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH;
01237       add_buckets(need_bucket_num(t));
01238     }
01239     else if (n < max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)
01240     {
01241       size_t t = get_entry_index(n);
01242       for (size_t i=t+1; i<entry_size_; i++)
01243       {
01244         if (get_entry(i)!=NULL)
01245         {
01246           hlfree(get_entry(i));
01247           set_entry(i, NULL);
01248           max_size_ -= BUCKET_LENGTH;
01249         }
01250       }
01251     }
01252 
01253     iterator it = end();
01254     size_t i=length_;
01255     for (;i<n; i++, it++)
01256       *it = c;
01257     length_ = n;
01258   }
01259   
01260 
01261   void resize ( size_t n )
01262   {
01263     assert (max_size_>=length_);
01264     
01265     if (n == max_size_)
01266     {
01267       length_ = n;
01268       return;
01269     }
01270 
01271     if (is_refered())
01272     {
01273       char* p;
01274       size_t es = init_entry(n, &p);
01275       size_t st = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01276       
01277       const_iterator it = begin();
01278       size_t i=0;
01279       size_t ei = 0;
01280       for (;it!= end() && i<n; i++, it++)
01281       {
01282         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
01283           ei++;
01284       
01285         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
01286           = *it;
01287       }
01288             
01289       derefer();
01290       start_i_ = st;
01291       entry_size_ = es;
01292       max_size_ = init_max_size();
01293       length_ = n;
01294       p_ = p;
01295       clear_reference();
01296       return;
01297     }
01298 
01299     if (n > max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)
01300     {
01301       size_t t = n - max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH;
01302       add_buckets(need_bucket_num(t));
01303     }
01304     else if (n < max_size_-start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH)
01305     {
01306       size_t t = get_entry_index(n-1);
01307       for (size_t i=t+1; i<entry_size_; i++)
01308       {
01309         if (get_entry(i)!=NULL)
01310         {
01311           hlfree(get_entry(i));
01312           set_entry(i, NULL);
01313           max_size_ -= BUCKET_LENGTH;
01314         }
01315       }
01316     }
01317     
01318 
01319     length_ = n;
01320     
01321   }
01322 
01323   size_t capacity ( ) const
01324   {
01325     return max_size_ * sizeof(CharT);
01326   }
01327 
01328   void reserve ( size_t res_arg=0 )
01329   {
01330     if (res_arg<= capacity())
01331       return;
01332 
01333     size_t len = length_;
01334     resize(res_arg/sizeof(CharT));
01335     length_ = len;
01336   }
01337 
01338   void clear()
01339   {
01340     derefer();
01341     length_ = max_size_ = 0;
01342     start_i_ = -1;
01343   }
01344 
01345   bool empty () const
01346   {
01347     return (length_==0);
01348   }

01370   }

01376     return get_char(pos);
01377   }
01378 
01379   //******************Modifiers********************
01380 public:
01381   SelfT& operator+= ( const SelfT& str )
01382   {
01383     return append(str);
01384   }
01385   
01386   SelfT& operator+= ( const CharT* s )
01387   {
01388     size_t len = getLen(s);
01389     return append(s, len);
01390   }
01391   
01392   SelfT& operator+= ( CharT c )
01393   {
01394     return append(1, c);
01395   }
01396   
01397   SelfT& append ( const SelfT& str )
01398   {
01399     if (!str.length())
01400       return *this;
01401 
01402     assign_self();
01403 
01404     if (p_==NULL)
01405       return assign(str);
01406     
01407     if (char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+str.length()>BUCKET_LENGTH)
01408       add_buckets((char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+ 1 + str.length())/BUCKET_LENGTH);
01409 
01410     const_iterator j=str.begin();
01411     size_t g = 0;
01412     for (iterator i=end();g<str.length();g++,i++,j++)
01413       *i = *j;
01414 
01415     length_ += str.length();
01416     clear_reference();
01417       
01418     return *this;
01419   }
01420   
01421   SelfT& append ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n=npos )
01422   {
01423     return append(str.substr(pos, n));
01424   }
01425   
01426   SelfT& append ( const CharT* s, size_t n )
01427   {
01428     if (n == 0)
01429       return *this;
01430     
01431     assign_self();
01432 
01433     if (p_==NULL)
01434     {
01435       return assign(s, n);
01436     }
01437     
01438     if (char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+n>BUCKET_LENGTH)
01439       add_buckets((char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+n)/BUCKET_LENGTH);
01440 
01441     
01442     size_t j=0;
01443     for (iterator i=end();j<n;i++,j++)
01444       *i = s[j];
01445 
01446     length_ += n;
01447     clear_reference();
01448     
01449     return *this;
01450     
01451   }
01452 
01453   SelfT& append ( const CharT* s )
01454   {
01455     size_t len = getLen(s);
01456     return append(s, len);
01457   }
01458 
01459   SelfT& append ( size_t n, CharT c )
01460   {
01461     if (n==0)
01462       return *this;
01463     
01464     assign_self();
01465     if (p_==NULL)
01466     {
01467       assign(n, c);
01468       return *this;
01469     }
01470     
01471     if (char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+n>BUCKET_LENGTH)
01472       add_buckets((char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)+1+n)/BUCKET_LENGTH);
01473 
01474     size_t j=0;
01475     for (iterator i=end();j<n;i++,j++)
01476       *i = c;
01477 
01478     length_ += n;
01479     clear_reference();
01480     
01481     return *this;
01482   }
01483 
01484   template <class InputIterator>
01485   SelfT& append ( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
01486   {
01487     for (InputIterator i=first(); i!=last; i++)
01488       appand(1, *i);
01489 
01490     return *this;
01491   }
01492 
01493   void push_back ( CharT c )
01494   {
01495     append(1, c);
01496   }
01497 
01498   SelfT& push_front (const SelfT& str)
01499   {
01500     // SelfT s(str);
01501 //     s += *this;
01502 //     assign(s);
01503 //     return *this;
01504     
01505     if (!str.length())
01506       return *this;
01507 
01508     assign_self();
01509 
01510     if (p_==NULL)
01511       return assign(str);
01512     
01513     if (BUCKET_LENGTH - char_index_in_bucket(0)+1+str.length()>BUCKET_LENGTH)
01514       add_buckets((BUCKET_LENGTH - char_index_in_bucket(0)+ 1 + str.length())/BUCKET_LENGTH, false);
01515 
01516     const_iterator j=str.end()-1;
01517     size_t g = str.length();
01518     for (iterator i=begin()-1;g>0; start_i_--,g--, i--,j--)
01519       *i = *j;
01520 
01521     length_ += str.length();
01522     clear_reference();
01523 
01524     return *this;    
01525   }
01526 
01527   SelfT& push_front (CharT c)
01528   {
01529     if (length_ == 0)
01530       return assign(1, c);
01531     
01532     if (start_i_%BUCKET_LENGTH != 0)
01533     {
01534       start_i_--;
01535       set_char(start_i_, c);
01536       length_++;
01537       return *this;
01538     }
01539 
01540     if (get_entry_index(start_i_) == 0)
01541     {
01542       p_ = (char*)hlrealloc(p_, need_entry_bytes(++entry_size_));
01543       //shift entry
01544       uint64_t* en = get_entry_array();
01545       for (size_t i=entry_size_-1; i>0; i--)
01546         en[i] = en[i-1];
01547       en[0] = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
01548       start_i_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
01549       max_size_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
01550     }
01551     
01552     start_i_--;
01553     
01554     if (get_entry(get_entry_index(0))==NULL)
01555     {
01556       uint64_t* en = get_entry_array();
01557       en[0] = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
01558       max_size_ += BUCKET_LENGTH;
01559     }
01560     
01561     set_char(start_i_, c);
01562     
01563     length_++;
01564     return *this;
01565   }
01566 
01567   SelfT& assign ( const SelfT& str )
01568   {
01569     if (p_!=NULL && str.begin() == begin()
01570         && length_ == str.length()
01571         && compare(str)==0)
01572       return *this;
01573     
01574     derefer();
01575       
01576     if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01577     {
01578       p_ = str.p_;  
01579       start_i_ = str.start_i_;
01580       length_ = str.length_;
01581       max_size_ = str.max_size_;
01582       entry_size_ = str.entry_size_;
01583       
01584       refer();
01585       
01586       assert(length_<=max_size_);
01587     }
01588     else
01589     {
01590       entry_size_ = init_entry(str.length(), &p_);
01591       start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01592 
01593       const_iterator j=str.begin();
01594       size_t g = 0;
01595       for (iterator i=begin();g<str.length(); g++, j++, i++)
01596         *i = *j;
01597         
01598       max_size_ = init_max_size();
01599       length_ = str.length_;
01600             
01601       clear_reference();
01602     }
01603 
01604     return *this;
01605   }
01606   
01607   SelfT& assign ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n )
01608   {
01609     if (n != npos)
01610       assert(str.length_ >= pos+n);
01611 
01612     derefer();
01613     
01614     if (n == npos)
01615         length_ = str.length_ - pos;
01616     else
01617         length_ = n;
01618 
01619     if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01620     {
01621       p_ = str.p_;
01622       refer();
01623       
01624       start_i_ = str.start_i_ + pos;
01625       max_size_ = str.max_size_;
01626       entry_size_ = str.entry_size_;
01627     }
01628     else
01629     {
01630       entry_size_ = init_entry(length_, &p_);
01631       start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01632 
01633       const_iterator j=str.begin()+pos;
01634       size_t g = pos;
01635       for (iterator i=begin();g<length_+pos;g++, j++, i++)
01636         *i = *j;
01637         
01638       max_size_ = init_max_size();
01639             
01640       clear_reference();
01641     }
01642 
01643     return *this;
01644   }
01645   
01646   SelfT& assign ( const CharT* s, size_t n )
01647   {
01648     derefer();
01649     
01650     entry_size_ = init_entry(n, &p_);
01651     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01652     length_ = n;
01653     
01654     for (iterator i=begin();n!=0; s++, n--, i++)
01655       *i = *s;
01656         
01657     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01658             
01659     clear_reference();
01660       
01661     return *this;
01662   }
01663 
01664   SelfT& assign ( const CharT* s )
01665   {
01666     assert (s !=NULL);
01667 
01668     return assign(s, getLen(s));
01669   }
01670 
01671   SelfT& assign ( size_t n, CharT c )
01672   {
01673     derefer();
01674     
01675     entry_size_ = init_entry(n, &p_);
01676     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01677     length_ = n;
01678     
01679     for (iterator i=begin();n!=0;n--, i++)
01680       *i = c;
01681 
01682     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01683             
01684     clear_reference();
01685     
01686     return *this;
01687   }
01688 
01689   SelfT& assign (const std::vector<CharT>& v)
01690   {
01691     derefer();
01692         
01693     entry_size_ = init_entry(v.size(), &p_);
01694     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01695     length_ = v.size();
01696 
01697     typename std::vector<CharT>::const_iterator j = v.begin();
01698     for (iterator i=begin(); j!=v.end();j++, i++)
01699       *i = *j;
01700         
01701     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01702             
01703     clear_reference();
01704 
01705     return *this;
01706   }
01707 
01708   SelfT& assign (const std::string& str)
01709   {
01710     derefer();
01711     
01712     entry_size_ = init_entry(str.length(), &p_);
01713     start_i_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01714     length_ = str.length();
01715 
01716     typename std::string::const_iterator j = str.begin();
01717     for (iterator i=begin(); j!=str.end();j++, i++)
01718       *i = *j;
01719         
01720     max_size_ = init_max_size();
01721             
01722     clear_reference();
01723 
01724     return *this;
01725   }
01726   
01727   template <class InputIterator>
01728   SelfT& assign ( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
01729   {
01730     derefer();
01731     
01732     InputIterator i=first;
01733     if (i!=last)
01734     {
01735       assign(1, *i);
01736       i++;
01737     }
01738     
01739     for (; i!=last; i++)
01740       append(1, *i);
01741 
01742     return *this;
01743   }
01744 
01745   SelfT& insert ( size_t pos1, const SelfT& str )
01746   {
01747     if (str.length() == 0)
01748       return *this;
01749 
01750     assert(pos1<length_);
01751 
01752     if (pos1==length_-1)
01753     {
01754       append(str);
01755       return *this;
01756     }
01757 
01758     return replace(pos1+1,0 , str);
01759   }
01760   
01761   SelfT& insert ( size_t pos1, const SelfT& str, size_t pos2, size_t n )
01762   {
01763     return insert(pos1, str.substr(pos2, n));
01764   }
01765   
01766   SelfT& insert ( size_t pos1, const CharT* s, size_t n)
01767   {
01768     SelfT ss(s, n);
01769     //ss.attach(s, n);
01770     return insert(pos1, ss);
01771   }
01772   
01773   SelfT& insert ( size_t pos1, const CharT* s )
01774   {
01775     SelfT ss(s);
01776     //ss.attach(s);
01777     return insert(pos1, ss);
01778   }
01779   
01780   SelfT& insert ( size_t pos1, size_t n, CharT c )
01781   {
01782     SelfT ss(n, c);
01783     return insert(pos1, ss);
01784   }
01785   
01786   iterator insert ( iterator p, CharT c )
01787   {
01788     uint64_t i = p - begin();
01789     assign_self();
01790     insert(i, 1, c);
01791     return iterator(begin()+i+1);
01792   }
01793   
01794   void insert ( iterator p, size_t n, char c )
01795   {
01796     uint64_t i = p - begin();
01797     assign_self();
01798     insert(i, n, c);
01799     return iterator(begin()+i+1);
01800   }
01801   
01802   template<class InputIterator>
01803   void insert( iterator p, InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
01804   {
01805     uint64_t i = p - begin();
01806     assign_self();
01807     
01808     SelfT s;
01809     s.assign(first, last);
01810     
01811     insert(i, s);
01812   }
01813 
01814   SelfT& erase ( size_t pos = 0, size_t n = npos )
01815   {
01816     assign_self();
01817     if (p_==NULL)
01818         return *this;
01819 
01820     if (pos ==0)
01821     {
01822       length_ -= (n==npos? length_: n);
01823       start_i_ += (n==npos? length_: n);
01824       
01825       return *this;
01826     }
01827 
01828     assert(pos<length_);
01829     
01830     if (n >= length_ - pos)
01831     {
01832       length_ = pos;
01833       return *this;
01834     }
01835 
01836       
01837     for (iterator i=begin()+pos, j=begin()+pos+n; j<end(); i++, j++)
01838       *i = *j;
01839 
01840     length_ -= n;
01841     clear_reference();
01842 
01843     return *this;
01844   }
01845   
01846   iterator erase ( iterator position )
01847   {    
01848     uint64_t i = position - begin();
01849     erase(i, 1);
01850     return iterator(begin()+i);
01851   }
01852   
01853   iterator erase ( iterator first, iterator last )
01854   {
01855     uint64_t i = first - begin();
01856     uint64_t j = last - begin();
01857     erase(i, j-i);
01858     return iterator(begin()+i);
01859   }
01860   
01861 protected:
01862   SelfT& replace_ ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, SelfT str )
01863   {        
01864     int r = BUCKET_LENGTH- char_index_in_bucket(pos1);
01865     if (r < (int)str.length())
01866       r += (str.length()-r)%BUCKET_LENGTH;
01867     else r = str.length();
01868     
01869     size_t n = BUCKET_LENGTH- char_index_in_bucket(pos1);
01870     if (n < n1)
01871       n += (n1-n)%BUCKET_LENGTH;
01872     else n = n1;
01873 
01874     r -= n;
01875 
01876     if (r>0)
01877     {
01878       //std::cout<<r<<" "<<char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)<<std::endl;
01879       
01880       size_t y = (BUCKET_LENGTH - char_index_in_bucket(length_-1)-1);
01881       if ((size_t)r > y)
01882         add_buckets(need_bucket_num(r-y));
01883 
01884       // move
01885       size_t pos = length_-1;
01886       for (iterator i=end()-1, j=end()-1+r; pos>=pos1+n1;pos--,i--,j--)
01887       {
01888         *j = *i;
01889       }
01890       
01891     }
01892     else
01893     {
01894       //move
01895       for (iterator i=begin()+pos1+n1, j=begin()+(pos1+n1+r); i<end();j++, i++)
01896         *j = *i;
01897     }
01898     
01899     length_ += r;
01900 
01901     // add buckets
01902     if (str.length()>n1 && str.length() + char_index_in_bucket(pos1) - n1 >= 2*BUCKET_LENGTH)
01903     {      
01904       size_t k = (str.length() + char_index_in_bucket(pos1)-n1)/BUCKET_LENGTH-1;
01905       size_t m = get_entry_index(pos1);
01906 
01907       if (end_entry_index()+k>=entry_size_)
01908       {
01909         extend_entry(k);
01910       }
01911       
01912       uint64_t* entry = get_entry_array();
01913       for (size_t i=end_entry_index()+k; i-k>m; i--)
01914         entry[i] = entry[i-k];
01915 
01916       for (size_t i=0; i<k; i++)
01917         entry[m+1+i] = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
01918       
01919       length_ += k*BUCKET_LENGTH;
01920       max_size_ += k;
01921     }
01922 
01923     //delete bucket
01924     if (str.length()<n1 && n1 + char_index_in_bucket(pos1) - str.length()>=2*BUCKET_LENGTH)
01925     {
01926       size_t k = (n1+ char_index_in_bucket(pos1)-str.length())/BUCKET_LENGTH;
01927       size_t m = get_entry_index(pos1);
01928       
01929       uint64_t* entry = get_entry_array();
01930       for (size_t i=0; i>k; i++)
01931         entry[i+m+1]=0;
01932       
01933       for (size_t i=m+1; i+k<=end_entry_index(); i++)
01934         entry[i] = entry[i + k];
01935 
01936       for (size_t i=end_entry_index()-k+1; i<=end_entry_index(); i++)
01937         entry[i] = 0;
01938       
01939       length_ -= k*BUCKET_LENGTH;
01940       max_size_ -= k;
01941     }
01942     
01943     
01944     const_iterator j=str.begin();
01945     size_t g= 0;
01946     for (iterator i=begin()+pos1;g<str.length();g++, i++,j++ )
01947       *i = *j;
01948 
01949     clear_reference();
01950     
01951     return *this;
01952   }
01953 
01954 public:
01955   SelfT& replace ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const SelfT& str )
01956   {
01957     if (str.length() == 0)
01958     {
01959       erase(pos1, n1);
01960       return *this;
01961     }
01962     
01963     size_t new_len = length_-n1+str.length();
01964     
01965     if (is_refered())
01966     {
01967       char* p;
01968       size_t es = init_entry(new_len, &p);
01969       size_t st = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01970       size_t ei = 0;
01971 
01972       const_iterator it = begin();
01973       size_t i=0; 
01974       for (;it!= end() && i<pos1; i++, it++)
01975       {
01976         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
01977           ei++;
01978       
01979         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
01980           = *it;
01981       }
01982       
01983       it = str.begin();
01984       size_t g=0;
01985       for (; g<str.length();g++, i++, it++)
01986       {
01987         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
01988           ei++;
01989       
01990         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
01991           = *it;
01992       }
01993       
01994       it = begin()+pos1+n1;
01995       for (; it< end();i++, it++)
01996       {
01997         if ((st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH==0)
01998           ei++;
01999       
02000         ((CharT*)(*(uint64_t*)(p + sizeof(ReferT) + ei*sizeof(CharT*))))[(st+i)%BUCKET_LENGTH]
02001           = *it;
02002       }
02003       
02004       derefer();
02005 
02006       entry_size_ = es;
02007       max_size_ = init_max_size();
02008       length_ = new_len;
02009       start_i_ = st;
02010       p_ = p;
02011       clear_reference();
02012 
02013       return *this;
02014     }
02015     
02016     if(p_ == NULL)
02017       return assign(str);
02018 
02019     return replace_(pos1, n1, str);
02020   }
02021   
02022   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, const SelfT& str )
02023   {
02024     assert(i1<=i2);
02025     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02026     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02027     return replace(i, j-i+1, str);
02028   }

02031   {
02032     return replace(pos1, n1, str.substr(pos2, n2));
02033   }

02081 
02082   template<class InputIterator>
02083   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, InputIterator j1, InputIterator j2 )
02084   {
02085     assert(i1<=i2);
02086     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02087     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02088     SelfT s1 = substr(i, j-i+1);
02089     SelfT s2 = substr(j+1);
02090     assign(s1);
02091     append<InputIterator>(j1, j2);
02092     append(s2);
02093 
02094     return *this;
02095   }

02097   size_t copy ( CharT* s, size_t n, size_t pos = 0) const
02098   {
02099     size_t j=0;
02100     for (const_iterator i=begin()+pos; i<end() && j<n; j++, i++)
02101            s[j] = *i;
02102          
02103     return j;
02104   }

02106   void swap ( SelfT& str )
02107   {
02108     SelfT s = str;
02109     str = *this;
02110     *this = s;
02111   }

02125   size_t find ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos = 0 ) const
02126   {
02127     size_t i = Algorithm<SelfT>::KMP(substr(pos), str);
02128     if (i == (size_t)-1)
02129       return -1;
02130     
02131     return pos + i;
02132   }
02133   
02134   size_t find ( const CharT* s, size_t pos, size_t n ) const
02135   {
02136     SelfT ss(s, n);
02137     //ss.attach(s, n);
02138     
02139     return find(ss, pos);
02140   }
02141   
02142   size_t find ( const CharT* s, size_t pos = 0 ) const
02143   {
02144     SelfT ss(s);
02145     //ss.attach(s);
02146     
02147     return find(ss, pos);
02148   }
02149   
02150   size_t find ( CharT c, size_t pos = 0 ) const
02151   {
02152     for (const_iterator i =begin()+pos; i<end(); i++)
02153       if (*i==c)
02154         return i-begin();
02155     return -1;
02156   }
02157 
02158   size_t rfind ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos = npos ) const
02159   {
02160     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02161     
02162     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), str);
02163   }
02164   
02165   size_t rfind ( const char* s, size_t pos, size_t n ) const
02166   {
02167     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02168     
02169     SelfT ss(s, n);
02170     //ss.attach(s, n);
02171     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), ss);
02172   }
02173   
02174   size_t rfind ( const char* s, size_t pos = npos ) const
02175   {
02176     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02177     
02178     SelfT ss(s);
02179     //ss.attach(s);
02180     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), ss);
02181   }
02182   
02183   size_t rfind ( char c, size_t pos = npos ) const
02184   {
02185     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02186     const_iterator i = pos==npos? rbegin(): begin()+pos;
02187     
02188     for (; i!=rend(); i++)
02189       if (*i==c)
02190         return i-begin();
02191     return -1;
02192   }

02213 //   size_t find_last_not_of ( const char* s, size_t pos, size_t n ) const{}
02214 //   size_t find_last_not_of ( const char* s, size_t pos = 0 ) const{}
02215 //   size_t find_last_not_of ( char c, size_t pos = 0 ) const{}
02216 
02217   SelfT substr ( size_t pos = 0, size_t n = npos ) const
02218   {
02219     return SelfT(*this, pos, n);
02220   }
02221 
02222   int compare ( const SelfT& str ) const
02223   {
02224     const_iterator i=begin();
02225     const_iterator j=str.begin();
02226     size_t g = 0;
02227     for (; g<length() && g<str.length(); g++, j++, i++)
02228     {
02229       if (*i>*j)
02230         return 1;
02231       if (*i < *j)
02232         return -1;
02233     }
02234 
02235     if (g==length() && g == str.length())
02236       return 0;
02237     if (i== end())
02238       return -1;
02239 
02240     return 1;
02241   }
02242   
02243   int compare ( const CharT* s ) const
02244   {
02245     size_t len = getLen(s);
02246     
02247     const_iterator i=begin();
02248     size_t j=0;
02249     size_t g = 0;
02250     for (; g<length() && j<len; g++, j++, i++)
02251     {
02252       if (*i>s[j])
02253         return 1;
02254       if (*i<s[j])
02255         return -1;
02256     }
02257 
02258     if (g==length() && j==len)
02259       return 0;
02260     if (i== end())
02261       return -1;
02262 
02263     return 1;
02264   }
02265   
02266   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const SelfT& str ) const
02267   {
02268     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(str);
02269   }
02270   
02271   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const CharT* s) const
02272   {
02273     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(s);
02274   }
02275   
02276   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const SelfT& str, size_t pos2, size_t n2 ) const
02277   {
02278     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(str.substr(pos2, n2));
02279   }
02280   
02281   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const CharT* s, size_t n2) const
02282   {
02283     SelfT str(s ,n2);
02284     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(str);
02285   }

02287   std::vector<CharT> cast_std_vector()const
02288   {
02289     std::vector<CharT> v;
02290     v.resize(length_);
02291     for (const_iterator i=begin(); i!=end(); i++)
02292       v.push_back(*i);
02293 
02294     return v;
02295   }
02296   
02297   std::string cast_std_string()const
02298   {
02299     std::string s;
02300     s.reserve(length_);
02301     for (const_iterator i=begin(); i!=end(); i++)
02302       s +=(*i);
02303     return s;
02304   }

02311   template<class Archive>
02312   void save(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)  const
02313   {
02314     ar & length_;
02315     ar & max_size_;
02316     ar & entry_size_;
02317     ar & start_i_;
02318     size_t o = -1;
02319 
02320     const uint64_t* en = get_const_entry_array();
02321     for (size_t i=0; i<entry_size_; i++)
02322     {
02323       if ((CharT*)en[i]!=NULL)
02324       {
02325         ar & i;
02326         ar.save_binary((char*)en[i], BUCKET_BYTES);
02327       }
02328       else
02329         ar & o;
02330     }
02331     
02332   }
02333 
02334   template<class Archive>
02335   void load(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
02336   {
02337     derefer();
02338     
02339     ar & length_;
02340     ar & max_size_;
02341     ar & entry_size_;
02342     ar & start_i_;
02343     
02344     p_ = malloc_char(need_entry_bytes(entry_size_));
02345     uint64_t* en = get_entry_array();
02346     for (size_t i=0; i<entry_size_; i++)
02347     {
02348       size_t k;
02349       ar & k;
02350       if (k == (size_t)-1)
02351       {
02352         en[i] = (uint64_t)NULL;
02353         continue;
02354       }
02355 
02356       en[i] = (uint64_t)malloc_CharT();
02357       ar.load_binary((char*)en[i], BUCKET_BYTES);
02358       
02359     }
02360         
02361     clear_reference();
02362   }
